Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $800000 to us due to its unique features, craftsmanship, and the benefits it offers. We believe it could be an invaluable addition to your collection or business, potentially enhancing its value and functionality. Considering its extraordinary qualities, we kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product for $800000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $800,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
